text: Manuel Serifo Nhamadjo (25 March 1958 - 17 March 2020) was a Guinea-Bissauan politician. He was the acting President of Guinea-Bissau from May 2012 to June 2014. His predecessor was Mamadu Ture Kuruma. Nhamadjo died on 17 March 2020 in Lisbon, Portugal at the age of 61.Décès de l’ancien président bissau- guinéen Manuel Serifo Nhamadjo ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Presidents of Guinea-Bissau
title: Manuel Serifo Nhamadjo
